div.h6: Frontier International Offers Arabic as a world language
Students have the opportunity to get involved in various academic groups and sports.
100% of Frontier's Class of 2018 graduated and were accepted to universities and college

div.h2: Discover Frontier International Academy GRADES K-5th & 9-12th

div.p: See how we go beyond curriculum mandates by offering Arabic education, after school programs, tutoring, and more!

Frontier International Academy is placed in a diversely rich community. Our Academy provides students with opportunities to explore their potential and become involved and knowledgeable citizens that give back to their communities. In addition to offering a strong curriculum, students have the opportunity to learn a second language, join athletic teams, academic clubs and more! We offer a safe learning environment that is inclusive and global.

Frontier Academy’s curriculum will be sufficiently broad to allow students the
opportunity to study a range of subjects including: English Language Arts, Mathematics,
Arabic Language, Science, Social Studies, PE, Technology, Art and Music.

div.p: Dr. Aabed holds a Doctorate of Philosophy and a Master of Education in Educational Leadership and Foundations. He is licensed in school administration and a licensed secondary education teacher (ESL), given by the Utah State Office of Education. In addition, he is a licensed school administrator, given by the Michigan State Office of Education.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-modern vc_btn3-color-purple
a.title: Frontier Academy Curriculum

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-modern vc_btn3-color-purple
a.title: Frontier Academy Curriculum

div.p: Average of 5 students per teacher during most hours of the day
College prep includes ACT testing and preparation
Comfortable work area where students are treated like the young adults they are
Quality laptops and mobile hotspots to do coursework anytime, anywhere
Enrolled students enjoyed the experience of learning at GEE Preparatory
Caring and professional educators available at each center for student convenience

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1521056452886 vc_row-has-fill vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex

div.p: Keep checking back for upcoming events!

td.div: Although buildings are closed for the 2019-2020 school year, GEE E-Learning continues! Important message from our Director and Superintendent
